Welcome to the website for Mark Bozinovic.

In my studies in Business Analytics I have created a number of easy to read charts and graphs in R Markdown language from various datasets. 

I also program Mobile Applications for Android using Java and have programmed numerous practical applications that are shown here.

I graduated from the [Victoria University](https://www.vu.edu.au/study-at-vu/courses/browse-for-courses/by-topic/business/enterprise-resource-planning-erp-systems) with a Masters in Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Systems in November 2020. For this course, I attained a Course GPA of 6.167 and a Course WAM: 75.000 (Distinction Average).

I currently work at Transdev Melbourne as a Service Delivery Specialist in the Public Trasport Victoria network.

Prior to Transdev, I was employed at Australia Post as a Credit Risk Manager, Procedures and Processes writer, SAP Fuctions across differet areas of the business including Finance, Inventory and Project Management.

With a significant amount of Industry and Academic experience and achievements, I look to enhance my career from my studies to work in the ever evolving ICT Industry.

In the personal space, I enjoy training in Martial Arts, Travelling (Domestic and International), Cooking, Time with my Family and AFL (Australian) Football.
